item.title: How to Use Hugo and GitHub Pages to Build Personal Blog
item.description:
My Needs

I want to build a personal academic blog, which should contain:

  • A simple bio page that lists my CV, and publications.
  • Pages of my blog articals, like technique articals and reading notes etc.
  • Catagory and tag system to help me organize my published blog articals.

Hugo + Github Pages = Perfect Solution

Step1: Install Hugo

Follow the Tutorial of Installation is enough. It provides 4 optional ways to install Hugo on Windows: downloading prebuilt binaries, use Chocolatey package manager, use docker image and run in docker, and build from source. And I choosed to download the prebuilt binary file.
